detail_desc: Sandals in imitation suede with hook and loop fastenings. Imitation suede linings and insoles, and fluted soles.

3-piece set in soft, fast-drying, breathable fleece comprising a hat, a pair of gloves and a tube scarf. Top of the index fingers of the gloves in touchscreen-compatible material.
Short, straight-cut dress in a viscose weave with a stand-up collar, an opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck and wide, 3/4-length sleeves. Unlined.

Short dress in a viscose weave with a V-neck, pleats at the front and an opening with buttons at the back of the neck. Long puff sleeves with a slit and button at the cuffs, an elasticated seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
